section.p: The provision of healthcare-related service(s) within the context of an encounter.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicalServceId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for this Clinical service .

Contains exactly one [1..1] typeOfService with data type Code
Clinical Speciality ID
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalProcedureRecord, where its type is Clinical Procedure Record

Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicalServceId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for this Clinical service .

Contains exactly one [1..1] typeOfService with data type Code
Clinical Speciality ID
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalProcedureRecord, where its type is Clinical Procedure Record
